coreServices.name: Local SEO Services
coreServices.description: Data-driven local SEO that puts your business on the map. We build your online visibility so local customers find you first.

coreServices.name: Website Design & Development
coreServices.description: SEO-optimized websites built to convert local searchers into customers. Fast, mobile-first, and designed around how people actually search.

coreServices.name: Google Business Profile Management
coreServices.description: Your Google Business Profile drives 60-70% of local leads. We optimize, manage, and grow your GBP so you show up in the map pack.

coreServices.name: Content Creation
coreServices.description: Strategic content that ranks and converts. Service pages, blog posts, and city pages built on keyword research and local search intent.

coreServices.name: Local Social Media
coreServices.description: Social media strategy that amplifies your local search visibility. We turn social signals into search signals.

coreServices.name: PPC & Google Ads
coreServices.description: Targeted paid search campaigns that deliver leads while your organic rankings grow. Google Ads and Local Service Ads managed for ROI.

processSteps.title: Discovery & Audit
processSteps.description: We audit your current local search presence — GBP, citations, website, reviews, and rankings — to identify gaps and opportunities.

processSteps.title: Strategy & Roadmap
processSteps.description: We build a 90-day action plan prioritizing the changes that will move your rankings fastest.

processSteps.title: Implementation
processSteps.description: We execute — optimizing your GBP, fixing citations, building links, and creating content that targets your highest-value keywords.

processSteps.title: Tracking & Optimization
processSteps.description: Monthly rank tracking, reporting, and strategy adjustments based on what the data shows is working.

processSteps.title: Citation Audit
processSteps.description: We scan 60+ directories and data aggregators to find where your business is listed, missing, or inconsistent.

processSteps.title: NAP Cleanup
processSteps.description: We correct every inconsistency — wrong phone numbers, old addresses, duplicate listings — across all sources.

processSteps.title: New Submissions
processSteps.description: We submit your business to every relevant directory with consistent, accurate information.

processSteps.title: Monitoring
processSteps.description: Ongoing monitoring to catch new inconsistencies and maintain citation health.

processSteps.title: Technical Audit
processSteps.description: We crawl your site to identify title tag issues, missing schema, slow pages, and indexation problems.

processSteps.title: Keyword Mapping
processSteps.description: We map target keywords to each page so every URL has a clear purpose in your search strategy.

processSteps.title: Optimization
processSteps.description: We update titles, meta descriptions, headings, schema markup, internal links, and content structure.

processSteps.title: Verification
processSteps.description: We validate all changes with Lighthouse audits and search console monitoring.

processSteps.title: Backlink Audit
processSteps.description: We analyze your current link profile and your competitors' to find gaps and opportunities.

processSteps.title: Prospect Research
processSteps.description: We identify high-quality local link opportunities — directories, sponsorships, associations, editorial placements.

processSteps.title: Outreach & Acquisition
processSteps.description: We reach out and secure real links from relevant, authoritative local websites.

processSteps.title: Reporting
processSteps.description: Monthly link acquisition report showing new links, domain authority growth, and ranking impact.

processSteps.title: Discovery & Architecture
processSteps.description: We research your market, plan your site architecture, and define the page hierarchy that search engines reward.

processSteps.title: Design & Prototyping
processSteps.description: We design mobile-first layouts with conversion-focused structure — CTAs, trust signals, and clear service navigation.

processSteps.title: Development & SEO
processSteps.description: We build the site with clean code, fast load times, schema markup, and every technical SEO element baked in.

processSteps.title: Launch & Handoff
processSteps.description: We test across devices, submit sitemaps, and hand over a site that is ready to rank from day one.

processSteps.title: Service Area Research
processSteps.description: We identify your target cities, map service-to-city combinations, and plan unique content for each area.

processSteps.title: Architecture Planning
processSteps.description: We build the URL hierarchy — city hubs, city-service pages — with internal linking that distributes authority.

processSteps.title: Content & Development
processSteps.description: We write genuinely unique city pages with local signals, FAQs, and area-specific data — not thin doorway pages.

processSteps.title: Technical Optimization
processSteps.description: Schema markup, geo-targeting, sitemap configuration, and staggered launch to avoid Google doorway filters.

processSteps.title: Current Site Audit
processSteps.description: We audit your existing site — what ranks, what converts, what needs to be preserved during the redesign.

processSteps.title: Redirect Planning
processSteps.description: We map every old URL to its new destination so you keep your existing rankings and link equity.

processSteps.title: Redesign & Build
processSteps.description: We redesign with SEO architecture baked in — faster, mobile-first, and structured for local search.

processSteps.title: Migration & Monitoring
processSteps.description: We launch with 301 redirects, monitor Search Console for errors, and ensure zero ranking loss.

processSteps.title: Conversion Research
processSteps.description: We study your target audience, competitors' landing pages, and the keywords driving traffic.

processSteps.title: Copy & Design
processSteps.description: We write conversion-focused copy and design a layout built around a single clear action.

processSteps.title: Build & Optimize
processSteps.description: We develop the page with fast load times, schema markup, and A/B testing capability.

processSteps.title: Performance Tracking
processSteps.description: We track conversions, bounce rate, and form completions to refine the page over time.

processSteps.title: GBP Audit
processSteps.description: We audit every field of your Google Business Profile — categories, attributes, photos, posts, Q&A, and reviews.

processSteps.title: Full Optimization
processSteps.description: We optimize your listing with the right categories, keyword-rich descriptions, and complete business information.

processSteps.title: Ongoing Management
processSteps.description: Weekly posts, photo uploads, Q&A monitoring, and review response management to keep your profile active.

processSteps.title: Performance Reporting
processSteps.description: Monthly reports on search visibility, calls, direction requests, and website clicks from your GBP.

processSteps.title: Category Analysis
processSteps.description: We research the best primary and secondary categories for your industry and location.

processSteps.title: Profile Enhancement
processSteps.description: We optimize every field — business description, attributes, services, products, and hours.

processSteps.title: Visual Content
processSteps.description: We add geotagged photos, service images, and team photos following Google's guidelines.

processSteps.title: Verification & Launch
processSteps.description: We verify all changes are live, set up tracking, and document the optimized state.

processSteps.title: Review Audit
processSteps.description: We analyze your current review landscape — count, rating, velocity, sentiment, and competitor comparison.

processSteps.title: Generation Strategy
processSteps.description: We build a review generation system with email/SMS sequences and staff training materials.

processSteps.title: Response Management
processSteps.description: We respond to every review within 24 hours — positive reviews get gratitude, negatives get professional resolution.

processSteps.title: Velocity Tracking
processSteps.description: We monitor review velocity and rating trends to ensure consistent growth.

processSteps.title: Map Pack Analysis
processSteps.description: We run grid-based rank scans to see exactly where you appear — and where you don't — across your service area.

processSteps.title: Ranking Factor Audit
processSteps.description: We analyze the three pillars — relevance, distance, and prominence — to find what's holding you back.

processSteps.title: Optimization Campaign
processSteps.description: We execute GBP optimization, citation building, review generation, and local link building to improve map visibility.

processSteps.title: Progress Tracking
processSteps.description: Bi-weekly rank scans showing map pack coverage changes with visual heat maps.

processSteps.title: Keyword Research
processSteps.description: We identify the search terms your target customers use — focusing on bottom-of-funnel, high-intent queries.

processSteps.title: Content Planning
processSteps.description: We build a content calendar with topics mapped to keywords, search intent, and your sales funnel.

processSteps.title: Writing & Optimization
processSteps.description: We write clear, engaging content structured for both search engines and AI systems — with capsule answers, schema, and internal links.

processSteps.title: Publishing & Tracking
processSteps.description: We publish, submit to Search Console, and track rankings and traffic for each piece.

processSteps.title: Topic Research
processSteps.description: We identify blog topics based on keyword gaps, customer questions, and seasonal trends in your market.

processSteps.title: Brief & Outline
processSteps.description: We create a detailed brief with target keyword, headings, internal links, and competitor analysis.

processSteps.title: Writing & Editing
processSteps.description: We write 800-1,500 word posts at a 5th-grade reading level with clear structure and natural keyword usage.

processSteps.title: SEO Optimization
processSteps.description: We add meta tags, schema markup, internal links to service pages, and optimized images before publishing.

processSteps.title: Competitor Analysis
processSteps.description: We analyze what's ranking for your target service keyword and identify the content gaps.

processSteps.title: Content Framework
processSteps.description: We structure the page with goal completion hierarchy — problem, solution, proof, call to action.

processSteps.title: Writing
processSteps.description: We write conversion-focused content that answers the searcher's questions and builds trust.

processSteps.title: Schema & Publishing
processSteps.description: We add Service schema, FAQ schema, and proper internal linking before publishing.

processSteps.title: Profile Audit
processSteps.description: We audit all social profiles for NAP consistency, completeness, and alignment with your search presence.

processSteps.title: Strategy Development
processSteps.description: We build a social strategy focused on local entity signals — not vanity metrics.

processSteps.title: Content Execution
processSteps.description: We create and schedule posts using the 40/25/20/15 pillar mix — local trust, engagement, educational, promotional.

processSteps.title: Performance Review
processSteps.description: Monthly reports on engagement, reach, and the impact on local search visibility.

processSteps.title: Platform Selection
processSteps.description: We identify which platforms matter for your industry and local market — not every platform, the right ones.

processSteps.title: Profile Creation
processSteps.description: We set up profiles with consistent NAP, keyword-optimized bios, and branded visuals.

processSteps.title: Integration
processSteps.description: We link social profiles to your GBP, website, and citation network for entity consistency.

processSteps.title: Training & Handoff
processSteps.description: We train your team on posting best practices and provide templates for ongoing content.

processSteps.title: Content Audit
processSteps.description: We review existing content and identify repurposing opportunities from blog posts, reviews, and service pages.

processSteps.title: Calendar Planning
processSteps.description: We build a monthly calendar with post topics, formats, and optimal posting times for your audience.

processSteps.title: Content Creation
processSteps.description: We create platform-specific content — carousel posts, short videos, testimonials, local tips.

processSteps.title: Scheduling & Publishing
processSteps.description: We schedule posts and monitor engagement to refine timing and content types.

processSteps.title: Account Audit
processSteps.description: We audit your existing campaigns — or research your market from scratch — to find the highest-ROI opportunities.

processSteps.title: Campaign Architecture
processSteps.description: We build campaigns structured around service lines and locations with tight keyword targeting and negative keyword lists.

processSteps.title: Launch & Optimize
processSteps.description: We launch campaigns, monitor performance daily, and adjust bids, ads, and targeting based on conversion data.

processSteps.title: Reporting & Scaling
processSteps.description: Monthly ROI reports with clear cost-per-lead data. We scale what works and cut what doesn't.

processSteps.title: Keyword Research
processSteps.description: We identify high-intent search terms with commercial value — the queries that lead to phone calls and form fills.

processSteps.title: Ad Copy & Extensions
processSteps.description: We write compelling ad copy with location extensions, call extensions, and structured snippets.

processSteps.title: Landing Page Alignment
processSteps.description: We ensure every ad points to a relevant, conversion-optimized landing page — not your homepage.

processSteps.title: Bid Management
processSteps.description: We manage bids to maximize conversions within your budget, using dayparting and geo-targeting.

processSteps.title: Eligibility Check
processSteps.description: We verify your business qualifies for Local Service Ads and gather required documentation.

processSteps.title: Profile Setup
processSteps.description: We set up your LSA profile with service areas, business hours, and verified credentials.

processSteps.title: Budget & Bidding
processSteps.description: We configure your weekly budget and lead preferences to match your capacity.

processSteps.title: Lead Management
processSteps.description: We monitor lead quality, dispute invalid leads, and optimize your profile for the Google Guaranteed badge.

cities.name: Basel
cities.responseTime: Same day — 15 minutes from our office
cities.description: Basel is Switzerland's third-largest city and a global hub for life sciences and pharma. Hundreds of SMEs in the Basel area need local visibility to compete with industry giants for talent, clients, and attention.
cities.localContext: Home to Novartis and Roche campuses, the Messe Basel convention center, and a thriving startup scene in Dreispitz. The trinational metro area (CH/DE/FR) means businesses often need multi-language SEO. Key business districts include St. Johann, Gundeldingen, and Kleinbasel.

cities.name: Zürich
cities.responseTime: Same day — virtual consultation within hours
cities.description: Zürich ist die grösste Stadt der Schweiz und ihre Finanzhauptstadt. Mit über 116'000 registrierten Unternehmen im Kanton ist der Wettbewerb um lokale Suchsichtbarkeit intensiv — und die meisten Unternehmen investieren zu wenig in Local SEO.
cities.localContext: Europas Fintech-Zentrum mit Google, UBS und Zurich Insurance als Hauptsitz. Zürich-West (Kreis 5) ist das Tech- und Startup-Epizentrum. Bahnhofstrasse und Kreis 1 beherbergen Premium-Dienstleistungen. Über 434'000 Einwohner und ein Metropolgebiet von 1,4 Millionen machen Zürich zum wettbewerbsintensivsten Schweizer Markt für lokale Suche.

cities.name: Bern
cities.responseTime: Same day — virtual consultation within hours
cities.description: Bern is Switzerland's federal capital and a hub for SMEs — 67% of jobs are in businesses with fewer than 250 employees. These small and medium businesses are exactly who benefits most from local SEO.
cities.localContext: The UNESCO World Heritage Altstadt is the political center, but Bern's economy runs on SMEs in precision manufacturing, medtech, and professional services. The Biel/Bienne innovation park nearby drives tech growth. Key neighborhoods: Kirchenfeld, Mattenhof, Breitenrain, Bümpliz. The call center industry employs 25% of Switzerland's total — a huge B2B opportunity.

localIssues: Trinational market (CH/DE/FR) requires multi-language SEO awareness
Swiss businesses pay premium rates but expect measurable ROI
High competition in Zurich and Basel for digital marketing keywords
Many Swiss SMEs still underinvest in local search presence
Google.ch and local search behavior differs from US/UK markets
Swiss privacy regulations affect tracking and analytics setup
homepageAnchorTextOptions: Datanalytico — local SEO that delivers results

linksTo: all city×service URLs for that city
